body: thanks for all the commenters above!!!

He looks a bit intense but he won't hurt her. And I'm an absolute sucker for these. So far the only one I can find are in korean novel and some rare josei smut here and there. Have you checked  ''Motoyan Nouka no H ga yabai! ~Tonikaku ore ni momaretero'' Its a really hot one as well.  Oh and '' Ichaicha Shiyou yo, Kumakei Kareshi kun'' if you want more agns't stuff. Oh right, also yoshiragi (they drew alot of futa girl but theres still a few that genderbend, its weird but they draw a really good looking male characters)

Artists who draw hot male character that i knew are; shuragyoku mami (its tales of the abyss doujin), kitoen/toko-ya (i recommend saint foire: evelyn or olwen, since the other series r basically just rape n ugly bastard), miyahara ayumu is also not bad, yoshitora (they draw some good looking male too, not particularly buff but they r pretty, i give them that), yagami dai's Rance series is also good, also udon-ya (check it out if u r familiar with monster hunter n want to see some hunters done dirty stuffs but some of them might be fall into category of rape(?) Bcs its forced but idk, all i know is the male is acceptable lol
